svg.title: Principle of single molecule localization microscopy.

cc:Work.dc:title: Principle of single molecule localization microscopy.
cc:Work.dc:description: a) A diffraction-limited image from a distribution single fluorophores. Each fluorophore image is a a single point spread function. b) Sequential switching of a sparse subset of fluorophores allows for their localization. c) The final, super-resolved image is reconstructed from the individual localizations.
